articles.author: Paul P. Murphy, Tim Lister and Rob Picheta, CNN
articles.title: Russian vehicles seen inside turbine hall at Ukraine nuclear plant
articles.description: New video has emerged online showing Russian military vehicles inside a turbine hall connected to a nuclear reactor at Ukraine's Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, where intensified shelling has fueled fears of a nuclear disaster.

articles.title: Takeaways from the court hearing on releasing more documents from the Mar-a-Lago search
articles.description: A US magistrate judge started the process of potentially releasing some information from the affidavit that the Justice Department used to obtain a search warrant for former President Donald Trump's Florida residence.

articles.author: Lawrence Richard
articles.title: California man convicted in pair of 1980s rape-murder cold cases: 'Sexually motivated serial killer'
articles.description: A jury convicted Horace Van Vaultz Jr for the rape-murders of two women in the 1980s. Investigators used new DNA evidence testing in the cold cases that were not available at the time.
articles.content:
A California man was convicted in Los Angeles Thursday for the rape and murder of two women in the 1980s, after investigators linked him to the case using new DNA evidence testing.

articles.author: Laura Studley and Tina Burnside, CNN
articles.title: 3 people are killed after 2 planes collide over California airport, authorities say
articles.description: Three people were killed after two planes crashed mid-air over the Watsonville Municipal Airport in California on Thursday afternoon, according to Mayor Eduardo Montesino.
articles.content: Three people were killed after two planes crashed mid-air over the Watsonville Municipal Airport in California on Thursday afternoon, according to Mayor Eduardo Montesino.

articles.author: Joe Sutton, CNN
articles.title: Judge partially blocks DeSantis' anti-'woke' law
articles.description: A federal judge in Florida on Thursday ruled that a law pushed by Florida Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis restricting conversations around race in schools and the workplace is unconstitutional.
articles.content: A federal judge in Florida on Thursday ruled that a law pushed by Florida Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis restricting conversations around race in schools and the workplace is unconstitutional.

articles.author: Amy B Wang, Mariana Alfaro
articles.title: McConnell warns GOP may not win Senate, as group linked to him invests heavily in Ohio
articles.description: The GOP leader predicted there is “probably a greater likelihood the House flips than the Senate,” despite an election cycle that typically would be advantageous for Republicans.
articles.content:
